bookTitle: Sir Gawain and the Green Knight
bookAuthors: Unknown, Burton Raffel, Neil D. Isaacs
Plot: Written by an anonymous 14th-century poet, this epic poem is recognized as an equal of Chaucer's masterworks and of the great Old English poems, including "Beowulf." This edition includes a Preface by Raffel and a new Introduction. Revised reissue.
Characters: Morgan le Fay, Sir Gawain, Sir Bertilak de Haute Desert, King Arthur
